item.title: C++ Type Casting With Example for C Developers
item.description: The typecasting is the feature which makes C++ more type-safe, robust & may convince you to use it over C.Â But this is also a more underrated topic when you are a newbie or moving from C background. Hence, I come up with an article on it. Here, we will not only see the C++ type casting with example but we will also cover Why do we need typecasting? & C++ type casting cheat codes for C developers to remember & employ it easily.
